1107.question: How big are the datasets used?

6-Table1-1.png: The datasets used in the CMRC 2018 and DRCD are 10,321 and 26,936 respectively.

1107.answer:
Evaluation datasets used:
CMRC 2018 - 18939 questions, 10 answers
DRCD - 33953 questions, 5 answers
NIST MT02/03/04/05/06/08 Chinese-English - Not specified

Source language train data:
SQuAD - Not specified
